## Cambios en las Categorias

71 especies que no habian sido evaluadas ahora cuentan con categor√≠a. 

```{r}
#| include: true
#| eval: true
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#| warning: false
#| fig-cap: "Explore como cambiaron las categor√≠as"
#| 
library(chorddiag)

Categ_long <- as.data.frame(as.matrix (table(Categorias_2025$Eval_old, Categorias_2025$Categoria)))
  
#convert table to matrix
#my_matrix <- matrix(Categ_square, ncol=ncol(Categ_square), #dimnames=dimnames(Categ_square))

## set up storage matrix
# get names for row and columns
nameVals <- sort(unique(unlist(Categ_long[1:2])))
# construct 0 matrix of correct dimensions with row and column names
myMat <- matrix(0, length(nameVals), length(nameVals), dimnames = list(nameVals, nameVals))

# fill in the matrix with matrix indexing on row and column names
myMat[as.matrix(Categ_long[c("Var1", "Var2")])] <- Categ_long[["Freq"]]



categ_iucn <- nameVals

dimnames(myMat) <- list(Antes = categ_iucn,
                    Ahora = categ_iucn)

# Create the bipartite chord diagram
interactive_plot2 <- chorddiag(t(myMat),
   type = "bipartite",
   groupColors = c("#D81E05",
                   "#D1D1C6", 
                   "#FC7F3F",
                   "#60C659",
                   "#e5e5e5",
                   "#CCE226", 
                   "#F9E814",
                   "#D81E05",
                   "#D1D1C6", 
                   "#FC7F3F",
                   "#60C659",
                   "#e5e5e5",
                   "#CCE226", 
                   "#F9E814"),
   groupnameFontsize = 14,
   groupnamePadding = 27,
   tooltipGroupConnector = "  a  ",
   showTooltips=TRUE,
   showZeroTooltips=FALSE
)

interactive_plot2
```
